Room.Name: Tranquility Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Tranquility Way, , west of the Brunskid Trader's Guild.
Room.LongDescription: There is an old-growth forest to the north which the city fathers have left completely undisturbed. At one time a land developer tried to go in there, thinking he would make a lot of money, but nobody ever saw him again. The forest on the south side seems to be a little younger then the north side, but its still quite mature.
